name: test_e2e_with_logs[603_REDIR_FRAG_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `REDIR_FRAG_001` |
| **Name** | Fragment-based redirect |
| **Category** | OPEN_REDIRECT |
| **Subcategory** | fragment_bypass |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `redirect=//evil.com#@good.com`
- **Encoded**: `redirect%3D%2F%2Fevil.com%23%40good.com`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~18000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:11:41.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Redirect] Open redirect attempt detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Redirect] Open redirect attempt detected test_id=REDIR_FRAG_001-1772277101426-s17j3 pattern_id=REDIR_FRAG_001 uri=/?q=redirect%3D%2F%2Fevil.com%23%40good.com client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX Redirect] Open redirect attempt detected test_id=REDIR_FRAG_001-1772277101426-s17j3 pattern_id=REDIR_FRAG_001 uri=/?q=redirect%3D%2F%2Fevil.com%23%40good.com client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```

```
